item.title: TryHackMe Writeup: Daily Bugle
item.description: Security is one of my side passion on computer engineering, and if you like security also, Try Hack Me is a nice place to browse. This morning i had a little bit of fun with Daily Bugle machine so I decided to publish my raw writeup. Scan the machine A standard NMap reveals ssh and port 80 opened, with the latest port revealing a joomla site; thus, if you do not want to be especially stealthy, you can let nmap test for vulnerability
